pages.text: 20|99|isee prakaar, (he nabee!) ham aapake samaksh vigat samaachaaron mein se kuchh ka varnan kar rahe hain aur hamane aapako pradaan kar dee hai apane paas se ek shiksha (quraan).
20|100|jo usase munh pherega, to vah nishchay pralay ke din laade hue hoga, bhaaree[1] bojh.
20|101|ve sada rahan vaale honge usamen aur pralay ke din unake lie bura bojh hoga.
20|102|jis din phoonk diya jaayega soor[1] (narasingha) mein, aur ham ekatr kar denge us din paapiyon ko, is dasha mein ki unakee aankhen (bhay se) neelee hongee.
20|103|ve aapas mein chupake-chupake kahenge ki tum (sansaar mein) bas das din rahe ho.
20|104|ham bhalee-bhaanti jaanate hain, jo kuchh ve kahenge, jis samay kahega unamen se sabase chatur ki tum keval ek hee din rahe[1] ho.
20|105|ve aapase prashn kar rahe hain parvaton ke sambandh mein? aap kah den ki uda dega unhen mera paalanahaar choor-choor karake.
20|106|phir dharatee ko chhod dega, samatal maidaan banaakar.
20|107|tum nahin dekhoge usamen koee tedhaapan aur na neech-oonch.

20|108|us din log peechhe chalenge pukaarane vaale ke, koee usase kataraayega nahin aur dheemee ho jaayengee aavaajen atyant krpaasheel ke lie, phir tum nahin sunoge kaanaaphoonsee kee aavaaz ke siva.
20|109|us din laabh nahin degee sifaarish, parantu jise aagya de atyant krpaasheel aur prasann ho usake[1] lie baat karane se.
20|110|vah jaanata hai, jo kuchh unake aage tatha peechhe hai aur ve usaka poora gyaan nahin rakhate.
20|111|tatha sabhee ke sir jhuk jaayenge, jeevit nity sthaayee (allaah) ke lie aur nishchay vah nishphal ho gaya, jisane atyaachaar laad[1] liya.
20|112|tatha jo sadaachaar karega aur vah eemaan vaala bhee ho, to vah nahin darega atyaachaar se, na adhikaar hanan se.

20|113|aur isee prakaar, hamane is arabee quraan ko avatarit kiya hai tatha vibhinn prakaar se varnan kar diya hai usamen chetaavanee ka, taaki log aagyaakaaree ho jaayen athava vah unake lie utpann kar de ek shiksha.
